skillTree.localised_name: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones
skillTree.localised_description: More than just a shield, this one channels the visceral power of the Old Ones to protect its bearer from magical attack.

effects.description: Ability: "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

skillTree.localised_name: Greater Ward of the Old Ones
skillTree.localised_description: Those who serve the Great Plan are afforded the Old Ones' protection via ancient incantations and bygone utterances.

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% for all units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kroak's ancient lineage provide a powerful telepathic link by which orders are conveyed and the Old Ones' will is reinforced.
As one of the First Generation of Slann, Kroak knows much about long-forgotten magics and ingenious, war-winning technology thought obsolete.
You cannot kill what's already dead.
The power to move objects without touching them makes missiles attacks against this one largely pointless.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.
The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.
Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -15
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: All shall be one, as it is written.
The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.
Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.
When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.
"Everywhere we shine, death and life burn into something new…"
Mighty Lord Kroak spawns a small sun that, when it explodes, causes abject devastation… funnily enough.

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕ Explosion does not affect friendly troops

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Deliverance of Itza I"

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 5
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 10
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Mere walls cannot prevent Kroak from reaching his target.
After a great act of power and violence, the ability to quickly return to a state of grace is valuable indeed.
Nothing shall - or could - stand in Kroak's way. Nothing.

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

backgroundSkills.localised_name: The Spirit of the Venerable Lord Kroak
backgroundSkills.localised_description: Lord Kroak's power is that of a First Generation Slann, his connection with the Old Ones far greater than any of his living kin.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
